title: Impact
subtitle: Measured Outcomes
description: Data-driven impact metrics: properties rehabilitated, youth trained, jobs created, neighborhoods stabilized, capital deployed.
intro: Banor Group tracks outcomes across the integrated ecosystem. Every metric connects to our mission: train, build, fund, scale.

sections.title: Impact Methodology
sections.content: Metrics are verified through project records, employment data, and third-party reporting. We report annually and align with IRIS+ and industry standards for impact measurement.

items.title: Launch
items.description: Banor Foundation and Development launch. First cohort completes training.

items.title: Scale
items.description: Capital arm launches. 45 properties rehabbed. 800 youth trained.

items.title: Expansion
items.description: Six neighborhoods active. $18M deployed. 600+ jobs created.

items.title: Momentum
items.description: 127 properties. 2,400 youth. National interest for replication.

items.title: Replication
items.description: Pilot in second city. Capital raise for scale fund.

sections.title: Amplify Impact
sections.content: Partner with us to scale redevelopment and workforce development.
